user_review: This place was a surprise for me...I didn't expect much and was blown away by the food.   We shared a Bun bowl and some spring rolls.   Both were delicious!   Prices are fair, and the service was perfect.    My only point of criticism would be the overall cleanliness.   I didn't feel the place was as clean as I would like...table was sticky and little flies/gnats were flying around.   Not the best impression, but it didn't stop me :) .

We walked by this place not knowing what to expect! All I knew was that I wanted Phó. We ordered the chicken vegetable pho and the first sip of the broth made me light up because it was one of the best I've ever tasted! The atmosphere was great and the music added to the warmth of the delicious food  I highly recommend that you eat here.
